saving and loading
[definition area (defarea)]


Functions

bool surfit::defarea_load (const char *filename, const char *defname=0)
 loads defarea from file. If no defname specified, then first defarea will be loaded.
void surfit::defarea_unload ()
 unloads surfit_defarea from memory
bool surfit::defarea_save (const char *filename, const char *defname=0)
 saves surfit_defarea to file
bool surfit::defarea_save_grd (const char *filename)
 saves defarea to surfer grd file (ASCII format)
bool surfit::defarea_save_xyz (const char *filename)
 saves defarea to xyz-file (ASCII format)
